newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: India buys April kerosene from Total plus $33.40/T.
newsitem.headline: India buys April kerosene from Total plus $33.40/T.

text.p: State-owned Indian Oil Corp (IOC) has bought one 40,000-45,000-tonne superior kerosene cargo for April delivery from French refiner Total SA, industry sources said on Monday.
The tender was awarded at $33.40 per tonne above spot Mediterranean quotes on a cost-and-freight (c-and-f) basis to Madras or Haldia on the Indian east coast.
In its last tender, IOC purchased one cargo for March delivery from Kuwait Petroleum Corp (KPC) at $34.00 per tonne over Mediterrean spot quotes, c-and-f east coast.
